## Problem 1

Create a data frame with the specified elements 

```{r}
prob1_df =
  tibble(
   samp = rnorm(10),
   samp_gt_0 = samp > 0, 
   char_vec = c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "j"),
   factor_vec =  factor(c("low", "low", "low", "mod", "mod", "mod", "mod", "high", "high", "high"))
 )
```
